Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the natural world with our "Nature Serenity" Chrome extension. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted by stunning, high-definition images of breathtaking landscapes, lush forests, serene lakes, and majestic mountains. These images are carefully curated to inspire joy, boost your mood, and awaken your sense of wonder. Whether you're a nature enthusiast or simply looking for a daily dose of beauty, "Nature Serenity" is your gateway to a visual journey through the wonders of the Earth. Experience the serenity of nature, one tab at a time.
This extension allows you to customize your new tab page with a variety of features, including:
Change the background image or color
Get Update on Weather and Time
Display your favorite websites or apps
Create custom themes
And more!
With New Tab Customizer, you can make your new tab page as functional and visually appealing as you want.
By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the Nature Serenity extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ new tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your search engine to be powered by Bing.
